attributes.action: Keep the Royal Air Force in Northern Ireland as a permanent force(230 Squadron)!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Keep the Royal Air Force in Northern Ireland! The idiotic decision has been made to pull 230 Squadron and the RAF as a whole to pull out of Northern Ireland! A high ranking officer recently said Northern Ireland is the perfect training environment for helicopter crews, we have more then enough inferstructure to cope, so why are we pulling out, who knows? It will cost the government more to move us then keep us here! Goodbye community relations and Northern Irish recruitment for the RAF!
